jobDescription: Actual Job Title:Data Manager Scientist, Web Tool DeveloperResponsibilities The candidate selected for this position will assist efforts within Veterinary Medicine Research and Development (VMRD) to develop, maintain and use VMRD Data Management Systems in accordance with applicable internal and regulatory policies and standards.  Successful candidates will have a strong technical background, with proven intermediate to advanced Web application development programming knowledge along with relational database design, SQL dialect knowledge, and data management experience. Specific responsibilities for this position include:Data ManagementFollowing business standards, work with study personnel to create Data Management Plans, which ensure data can be collected and transferred to the Clinical Data Management System according to business standardsProvide study-specific database setupProgramming SAS and/or SQL code for data transformation and loading tasksDevelop data validation checks using SAS and/or SQL programmingSupport of statistical analysis and reporting requirementsSupport VMRD's Clinical Data Management SystemsSupport, create and enhance our Desktop Tools and Web applicationsSupport our relational databasesCommunicating effectively with other departmental colleagues, line management, and customersQualificationsEducational Background:
